participant_2.background:
I had to put my dog down.
i aspire to be a millionaire.
i watch every football game at alabama.
i prefer the simpler times.
i like to go on long hikes.

content.text: Just got back from a hike. It was nice and sunny.
That's awesome, I love going on hikes. I usually hike with my dogs, but they're both old now so I don't get to go as much.
I'm sorry to hear that. I had to put my dog down a few years ago and it was really hard.
I know what you mean. It's never easy to say goodbye to a furry friend.
Yeah, I miss him a lot. What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a lab mix. They're both really sweet and love to go on walks.
Aww, that sounds adorable. I've always wanted a golden retriever.
They're great dogs. They're really friendly and love to play.
Maybe one day I'll get one. For now, I'm just enjoying my hikes.
That's great. I hope you have a nice day.
